name: The Adventurer
overview: The Adventurer is an ITC Entertainment TV adventure series created by Dennis Spooner that ran for one season from 1972 to 1973. It premiered in the UK on 29 September 1972. The show starred Gene Barry as Gene Bradley, a government agent of independent means who poses as a glamorous American movie star.

episodes.name: Miss Me Once, Miss Me Twice, and Miss Me Once Again
episodes.overview: Perminter orders Bradley to pose as a potential murder victim.

episodes.name: Poor Little Rich Girl
episodes.overview: Bradley and Diane help out a spoiled rich heiress.

episodes.name: Nearly the End of the Picture
Mr Galloway is a Very Cautious Man
The Case of the Poisoned Pawn
Icons Are Forever
episodes.overview: A terrier star of dog food commercials witnesses his master's murder, but can he help collar the killer?
